name: Safia
description: I am a very down to earth fun loving person.I am romantic considerate and sensitive.i noticed life without a loving man is incomplete.I enjoy good food, good wine and good conversation. I have been lonely for the past few years and i need someone loving honest and caring who has the Principle of love.I would like to find someone who is looking for a long term relationship. The love, loyalty and affection given to me will be returned with interest. I am a very open minded person who does not judge. In the ‘bedroom’ I am adventurous and open minded so best suited to someone who is also only limited by their own imagination. I always consider my partners feelings and believe in giving each other quality time. I am a very loyal partner and friend,i will make the man that come in to my life feel like a true king that he is.I hope to find the right one as soon as possible because staying alone without love in my life is affecting me in all ways.
